Here are the PDDL actions for the task "remove_players" based on the provided steps and descriptions:

```lisp
(define (domain remove_players)
  (:requirements :strips :typing)
  (:types person location gear secret name)
  
  ;; Action 1: Initiate a new member
  (:action initiate_new_member
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (member-initiated ?npc))
                    (not (member-initiated ?ss)))
    :effect (and
              (member-initiated ?npc)
              (member-initiated ?ss))
  )

  ;; Action 2: Set meeting location
  (:action set_meeting_location
    :parameters (?npc - person ?l - location)
    :precondition (and
                    (member-initiated ?npc)
                    (not (location-set ?l)))
    :effect (location-set ?l)
  )

  ;; Action 3: Create new member
  (:action create_new_member
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (member-initiated ?npc)
                    (member-initiated ?ss)
                    (not (member-created ?npc)))
    :effect (member-created ?npc)
  )

  ;; Action 4: Set dress code
  (:action set_dress_code
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (member-initiated ?npc)
                    (member-initiated ?ss)
                    (not (dress-code-set)))
    :effect (dress-code-set)
  )

  ;; Action 5: Teach new member secret
  (:action teach_new_member_secret
    :parameters (?adrian - person ?ss - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (member-initiated ?adrian)
                    (member-initiated ?ss)
                    (not (secret-taught ?adrian)))
    :effect (secret-taught ?adrian)
  )

  ;; Action 6: Create name
  (:action create_name
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (member-initiated ?npc)
                    (member-initiated ?ss)
                    (not (name-created)))
    :effect (name-created)
  )

  ;; Action 7: Create secret
  (:action create_secret
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (member-initiated ?npc)
                    (member-initiated ?ss)
                    (not (secret-created)))
    :effect (secret-created)
  )

  ;; Action 8: Read cliques info
  (:action read_cliques_info
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (member-initiated ?npc)
                    (member-initiated ?ss)
                    (not (cliques-info-read)))
    :effect (cliques-info-read)
  )
)
```

This PDDL domain definition includes actions for initiating new members, setting meeting locations, creating new members, setting dress codes, teaching secrets, creating names and secrets, and reading clique information, all based on the provided steps and descriptions. Each action has been defined with appropriate parameters, preconditions, and effects.

Here are the PDDL actions based on the provided task "create_cult":

```lisp
;; Action 1: Initiate New Member
(:action initiate_new_member
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (member-initiated ?npc ?ss))
                    (closest-friend ?npc)
                    (not (society-formed ?ss)))
    :effect (and
              (member-initiated ?npc ?ss)
              (society-formed ?ss))
  )

;; Action 2: Set Meeting Location
(:action set_meeting_location
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (meeting-location-set ?ss)))
    :effect (meeting-location-set ?ss)
  )

;; Action 3: Set Dress Code
(:action set_dress_code
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (dress-code-set ?ss)))
    :effect (dress-code-set ?ss)
  )

;; Action 4: Teach New Member Secret
(:action teach_new_member_secret
    :parameters (?adrian - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (member-initiated ?adrian ?ss)
                    (not (member-knows-secret ?adrian ?ss)))
    :effect (member-knows-secret ?adrian ?ss)
  )

;; Action 5: Create Name
(:action create_name
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (name-created ?ss)))
    :effect (name-created ?ss)
  )

;; Action 6: Create Secret
(:action create_secret
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (secret-created ?ss)))
    :effect (secret-created ?ss)
  )

;; Action 7: Read Cliques Info
(:action read_cliques_info
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (cliques-info-read ?npc ?ss)))
    :effect (cliques-info-read ?npc ?ss)
  )
```

These actions capture the steps and descriptions provided for creating a secret society (cult), ensuring that key elements such as initiation, meeting locations, dress codes, and secrets are properly represented in the PDDL actions.
